name: Task
description: a piece of work to be done or undertaken

name: Requirement
description: a thing that is needed or wanted

name: Project
description: Each project is typically designed to produce a distinct output, rather than a repetitive process

name: Process
description: a series of actions or steps taken in order to achieve a particular end

name: Entity
description: a thing with distinct and independent existence

name: Attribute
description: an object closely associated with or belonging to a specific person, thing, or office

name: System
description: a set of things working together as parts of a mechanism

name: Application
description: a piece of software designed to perform a specific task or a set of tasks for a user

name: Association
description: a relationship between two entities normally expressing cardinality
